page.title: 18MILLOM SCHOOL
page.content:
MILLOM SCHOOL IS RATHER A NICE SCHOOL.THE TEACHERS ARE QUITE NICE, THAT IS MOST OF THEM. SOME OF THEM ARE RATHER NASTY WHEN THEY WANT TO BE. THERE IS A LOWER SCHOOL, A MIDDLE SCHOOL AND AN UPPER SCHOOL . THE LOWER SCHOOL IS WHERE THE FIRST AND SECOND YRS ARE AND THE MIDDLE SCHOOL IS FOR THE THIRD AND FOURTH YRS. THE UPPER SCHOOL IS FOR THE FIFTH,SIXTH AND SEVENTH YRS. THE UPPER SCHOOL BUILDING IS THE OLDEST PART OF THE SCHOOL. MR FRIAR IS THE HEADMASTER OF THE WHOLE SCHOOL. MR WOODWARD IS THE HEADMASTER OF LOWER SCHOOL AND TAKES HISTORY . MR COLDWELL IS THE HEADMASTER OF MIDDLE SCHOOL AND TAKES GEOGRAPHY.THERE ARE ASSEMBLYS ON MONDAYS,WEDNESDAYS AND FRIDAYS .TUESDAY AND THURSDAYS ARE FORM PERIODS WHERE YOU HAVE TO DO WORK
CONTINUED...
